alert.note: Alert for Clay; Fillmore; Hamilton; York (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued April 18 at 9:30PM CDT until April 18 at 10:00PM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1000 PM CDT FOR NORTHEASTERN CLAY...SOUTHWESTERN YORK...SOUTHEASTERN HAMILTON AND NORTHERN FILLMORE COUNTIES... At 930 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Harvard to near Saronville to near Ong, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. These severe storms will be near... Saronville around 935 PM CDT. Sutton around 940 PM CDT. Stockham around 945 PM CDT. Henderson, Grafton and Lushton around 1000 PM CDT. Fairmont and Hampton around 1005 PM CDT. Bradshaw around 1010 PM CDT. McCool Junction around 1015 PM CDT. This includes Interstate 80 between mile markers 335 and 350. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
